short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter Long Text Editor converts the input Rich Long Text into an image and directly write to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
English:
For a long time, the long text editing experience on Twitter has been a headache. Although using a long text screenshot can solve this problem, it requires many steps and is still very cumbersome. To solve this issue, we launched the Twitter long text editor project. This chrome extension will make editing and sharing long text easier than before. With just a click, you can convert the input long text into an image and directly write it to the clipboard. No more complex steps, now you just need to focus on your creation.

中文：
长久以来，推特的长文本编辑体验一直令人头疼。虽然使用长文本截图可以解决这个问题，但它需要很多步骤，依然非常麻烦。为了解决这个问题，我们为您推出了推特长文本编辑器。这个浏览器插件将使得编辑和分享长文本变得轻而易举。只需轻轻一点，你就可以将输入的长文转换成图片，并直接写入剪贴板。不再需要复杂的步骤，现在，你只需要专注于你的创作。
